title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2806/88 of 9 September 1988 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3130/78 determining intervention centres for olive oil
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2806/88
of 9 September 1988
amending Regulation (EEC) No 3130/78 determining intervention centres for olive oil
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3130/78, the list of centres in Portugal is hereby replaced by the following:
1.2.3 // PORTUGAL:   // District   // Locality   //  // Évora   // Évora   //   // Santarém   // Vila Nova de Barquinha

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 September 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No 172, 30. 9. 1966, p. 3025/66.
(2) OJ No L 197, 26. 7. 1988, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 331, 28. 11. 1978, p. 13.
(4) OJ No L 370, 30. 12. 1978, p. 58.
(5) OJ No L 368, 31. 12. 1985, p. 20.
